idea: Mache Retail Pvt Ltd is an on-demand app-based fuel dispensing services available at your doorstep. We are currently in Ideation stage and will soon start prototyping and app development.

idea: I have done my BE in Mechanical stream. Having experience in teaching of  5 years and Industrial experience of 1 year. keen to start my own startup in E-commerce and Engineering.

idea: We are a B2B platform for packaging products which bridges the gap between buyers and sellers. We use technology to ensure buyers are getting optimum prices for good quality products, while sellers have a transparent process and increased reach to market. Our years of experience and understanding of the market complexities has helped to design this platform and the business model.
name: PACKSO TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
When everything in the world today right from Food, cab, clothes, cars can arrive at the doorstep with just a click on phone or laptop, then why not diesel?

Arti Petroleum Private Limited is an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel for your generator (DG sets) / cars/fleet vehicles etc.) in a safe, reliable, and efficient way. Anyone can place order online and get fuel delivered at your location in specialized Refuellers according to chosen schedule. We are making refueling smarter!
The doorstep diesel delivery solution not only provides convenience to the consumers but also roots out the losses in fuel procurement.
name: ARTI PETROLEUM PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Inculcating virtual reality into real estate industry, so as to bridge the gap between customers and developers by enhancing the experience before purchasing any commodity from the real estate market. Helping customers and government to minimize delays  that occur due to unprecedented situation and conditions.
name: Visuan

idea: BIDFAIR Global aspires to be “the” preferred auction house for Real Assets with a USP of bridge financing.

idea: Breads and Bakes is an individually run baking company that revolutionises Mumbai street food and serves it to you in a presentable and clean manner. Having found a lot of success in our initial product offerings, we are slowly but steadily expanding and diversifying in to various different products such as cakes, dips and chips. Our concentration is on clean and quality products.
name: Breads and Bakes

and process control and automation, artificial  intelligence, natural language processing and to undertake research and development, participating in seminars, workshops, exhibitions, conferences and the like and to obtain technical know-how, literature, brochures, technical data etc. from abroad and export/diss

idea: evento the name clearly shows that this is something about events . as i am a student and also a event photographer .  my idea is to make an application for event industry such as weddings, parties etc . where you can book online vendors from sitting at home . as you know event industry has large market and it is growing very fast . as per google there are over 10 million weddings in India every year. Estimated to be worth over $25bn and growing at 30% annually, it's one industry that hasn't seen a slowdown . and my idea has many solution for the problems. i need funding and advice for making my business model strong , we can talk in details about business model , how we are going to generate profits and hoe it is problem solving for customers .
name: evento

idea:
TribeTraveller.Com is a Social Travel Platform where like minded Traveller Meet & Travel with each other.

The Platform also aggregates the service providers for specific needs like Camping, Tour Guides, Car & Bike Rentals, Adventure Travel Operators as well as home and hostel stays for budget travellers.

The platform also helps in planning trips & has a marketplace for travel & leisure related products.
name: TRIBETRAVELLER TECHNOLOGIES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED
